item.title: Katherine add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Tom Upton
item.description: "If you just go with the flow, no matter what weird things happen along the way, you always end up exactly where you belong." -- Tom Upton

item.title: Katherine add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "Trust your heart if the seas catch fire, live by love though the stars walk backward." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Don't be afraid of death; be afraid of an unlived life. You don't have to live forever, you just have to live." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Katherine add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "For whatever we lose (like a you or a me), It's always our self we find in the sea." -- e.e. cummings

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Edward Gorey
item.description: "Books, Cats, Life is Good." -- Edward Gorey

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "And the rest is rust and stardust." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Eleanor Hodgman Porter
item.description: "Be glad. Be good. Be brave." -- Eleanor Hodgman Porter

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch
